Package com.thunken.beacon

Utilities for BEACON, a data interchange format for large numbers of uniform links.

Note: the current Javadoc for this project is incomplete. We rely on Lombok to generate boilerplate code, and generated methods are not yet included in the Javadoc. See beacon#1 for more details.

Author:
luc@thunken.com
See Also:
BEACON link dump format
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BeaconLink
    Main class for BEACON links.
    BeaconMetaFields
    Custom collection to hold multiple BEACON meta fields and their respective values.
    BeaconParser
    Main class to parse BEACON dumps.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    BeaconMetaField
    Enumerated type for BEACON meta fields.
    BeaconMetaField.Type
    Enumerated type for BEACON meta field types.
    BeaconMetaField.ValueType  
    BeaconUpdate
    Enumerated type for BEACON dump update frequencies.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    BeaconFormatException
    Thrown to indicate that a method has been passed data that violates the BEACON specification.
